text: Each CentaurBot has a store of memory. The bot can use it for many purposes – for example Chatbot uses the memory when people chat to it.
Plugins extend CentaurBot's abilities. They can be used to pull in data, use different AI models, and take action on protocols and web2 apps.
CentaurBot assists members by performing operational tasks and creating value for the coordinate.
Build AI-powered chat experiences. Uses Memory for context.
Manual and automated tools to create social posts on Twitter and Orbis.
Propose an action. Vote for or against others' proposals.
